SELECT c.id, c.barcode, c.is_borrowable AS isBorrowable, c.storage_date AS storageDate, cat.id AS catalogId, cat.name, cat.isbn, cat.publisher, cat.category, cat.publish_date AS publishDate, cat.author, cat.value FROM collection c INNER JOIN catalog cat ON c.catalog_id = cat.id WHERE 1=1
AND ( cat.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cat.author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR cat.publisher LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
AND cat.category LIKE CONCAT(#{bigCategory}, '%')
AND cat.category = #{subCategory}
ORDER BY c.id DESC

SELECT c.id, c.barcode, c.is_borrowable AS isBorrowable, c.storage_date AS storageDate, cat.id AS catalogId, cat.name, cat.isbn, cat.publisher, cat.category, cat.publish_date AS publishDate, cat.author, cat.value FROM collection c INNER JOIN catalog cat ON c.catalog_id = cat.id WHERE c.barcode = #{barcode}

SELECT c.id, c.barcode, c.is_borrowable AS isBorrowable, c.storage_date AS storageDate, cat.id AS catalogId, cat.name, cat.isbn, cat.publisher, cat.category, cat.publish_date AS publishDate, cat.author, cat.value FROM collection c INNER JOIN catalog cat ON c.catalog_id = cat.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.id, c.barcode, c.is_borrowable AS isBorrowable, c.storage_date AS storageDate, cat.id AS catalogId, cat.name, cat.isbn, cat.publisher, cat.category, cat.publish_date AS publishDate, cat.author, cat.value FROM collection c INNER JOIN catalog cat ON c.catalog_id = cat.id WHERE c.is_borrowable = true ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{count}
